description.@en: I am blanketed by the spirits; they shall see me to safety.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you are completely invisible during daylight hours, leaving no trace of your passing, and you cannot be heard (unless you wish to be).

criticalFailure.@en: You leave a glowing trail in your wake, one that can be easily discovered.

reagents.@en: You must Sleep in a safe place during daylight hours, and suffer 2D10+2 Peril from Starvation.
